patthana17.6:1.1: Kusalaṁ pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana17.6:2.1: Kusalaṁ sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana17.6:3.1: Kusalaṁ upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
